resources.string: Want to sleep but your Phone is Preventing you from doing so?!
Want to focus on your life by taking a rest from social media
Get Ready for bed, this will block some apps,reduce screen brightness and also mute all sounds. Goodnight and sleep tight
Studying always feels impossible until its done(Phonebia).This Mode will Push you to study by locking some apps and muting sounds
Its Time to focus. Its only after you have stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.This will lock lock some apps and mute sounds
